colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL ZHING, 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA RNGAMS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MGON KHANG PA BKAD CHEN LUNGS RIGS KYIS BSKUL BAS MTSAMS SBYAR ZHING, RANG NYID KYANG MOS PA CHEN POS BSKUL TE GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR BA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
